channel.title: What is RStreams? on RStreams
channel.description: Recent content in What is RStreams? on RStreams

item.title: Why RStreams?
item.description: ToC Why RStreams? Why not just AWS services? Design Priorities Data is the Feature Favor AWS Services over Proprietary Solutions Use the Right Tool/Database/Service for the Job Time Matters Why RStreams? Why not just AWS services? RStreams provides a near real-time messaging and streaming platform that knits together underlying AWS services to do the heavy lifting.
